E

Err - Exception in sabi
Err is an exception class with a reason.
Err(Record) - Constructor for exception sabi.Err
A constructor which takes a reason of this exception as an argument.
Err(Record, Throwable) - Constructor for exception sabi.Err
A constructor which takes a reason and a cause exception of this exception as arguments.

G

get(Enum<?>) - Method in exception sabi.Err
Gets an error situation parameter value by the specified name.
get(String) - Method in exception sabi.Err
Gets an error situation parameter value by the specified name.
getClassName() - Method in exception sabi.Err
Returns the fully qualified name of the class of this error occurrence.
getFileName() - Method in exception sabi.Err
Returns the name of the source file of this error occurrence.
getLineNumber() - Method in exception sabi.Err
Returns the name of the source file of this error occurrence.
getMessage() - Method in exception sabi.Err
Gets a message represents this exception.
getMethodName() - Method in exception sabi.Err
Returns the name of the method of this error occurrence.
getReason() - Method in exception sabi.Err
Gets the reason of this exception.
getSituation() - Method in exception sabi.Err
gets a map which contains error situation parameters.
